style: font-size: 20px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 3.99%;top: 1.42%;width: 13.51%;height: 11.71%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 35%;

text:
また片付け
たくないよ
style: font-size: 16px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 42.22%;top: 18.28%;width: 11.17%;height: 5.77%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 30%;transform: rotate(-17deg);

text:
やっと
俺達の力が
持てる
style: font-size: 20px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 83.56%;top: 2.91%;width: 10.11%;height: 12.19%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 50%;

text:
ママの力は
飛行！
超クール!
style: font-size: 20px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 4.41%;top: 34.98%;width: 11.70%;height: 13.29%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 50%;

text:
もし飛行能力あったら
学校に飛んで行けるね!
style: font-size: 16px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 19.95%;top: 48.43%;width: 17.98%;height: 7.94%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 40%;

text:
でももう
分かってる
でしょ!

text:

ハハ…
